alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 4:01PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jefferson and northeastern Leon Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 400 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northeast of Tallahassee. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Tallahassee, Festus, Baum, Capps, Lois, Nash, Killearn Lakes, Miccosukee, Iamonia, Drifton, Moccasin Gap, Casa Blanco, Waukeenah, Bradfordville, Montivilla, Lloyd, Pisgah Church and Lake Miccosukee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
